data.text:
――Mejiro Ramonu was going to run. Many trainers 
and Uma Musume had gathered in the spectator 
seats to just get a glimpse. Among those――

I'm really looking forward to Ramonu's mock race…… 
But, doesn't it seem like this was really sudden?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

data.text: That's just how she is.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
This race had a sudden opening. While discussing 
what to do, she just said 『What's my gate number?』…… 
I heard it was a decision from higher up.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: So that's how it is……so that's why those girls are like "that".
data.name: Mr. C.B.

data.text: Uuuu, why is Ramonu-san……I hadn't heard about this!
data.name: Uma Musume A

data.text:
Just her aura is scary……just when we had the chance to run 
in front of a bunch of people……it might be impossible.
data.name: Uma Musume B

data.text:
It seemed like Mejiro Ramonu had an intimidating presence atop 
the turf. If it was like this, it wouldn't be a proper race……
How boring.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text: Eh……？
data.name: Uma Musume A

data.text:
I want to race. However……if it's like this, 
it'll just end up being one-sided.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
That can't be called a race…… 
Is there a single one of you that can keep me entertained?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text: Hiii……!
data.name: Uma Musume

data.text:
The Uma Musume were even more intimidated by Ramonu's 
provocative words…… However, from among them――

……! Just saying whatever you want……! 
Fine, that arrogant attitude…… I'll crush you!
data.name: Uma Musume C

data.text: ……Fufu. You're wonderful――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Thus, with a heavy atmosphere, the mock race 
began…… From beginning to end, it ended up 
becoming a solo performance by Mejiro Ramonu……
Huuu……!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu showed a beautiful example of a start dash. 
She took a good position to wait for her chance. And then――
――Right here.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text: Huuu……!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
She timed it perfectly…… in an instant, she broke through. 
Nobody was able to keep up.

Kuuu…… reach her……! 
I don't want to lose……! Aaaahhhhhh!
data.name: Uma Musume C

data.text:
――Aahh……perfect. Yes, this is it…… 
Fufuu…… Ahahahaa……!!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
……all of those girls, they're all talented and aiming to debut soon. 
Even then……it's almost like they aren't even a challenge to her.
data.name: Trainer A

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu…… so that's the new scion of the Mejiro family…… 
How perfect――and fearsome.
data.name: Trainer B

data.text:
The noise of the crowd sounded far away, drowned out 
by the beating of my own heart…… just like that time――

――When Symboli Rudolf became an Undefeated Triple Crown 
Uma Musume…… No, even more so than any other race before.

The first ever Triple Tiara……the only one capable of 
achieving that honor, it has to be Mejiro Ramonu……!
Huh? That person……
data.name: Mr. C.B.

data.text:
Yes. ……this time, I hope it goes well. 
No, I need it to go well or it'll be very troubling.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Oh? Are you going to go support them?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

data.text:
I'm just going to take a look. Whether I get involved or not, 
things will still end up going her way, after all……
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
……they've known each other since way back, right? 
For some reason Rudolf seems……excited?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

data.text:
I followed quickly after Mejiro Ramonu after 
she left the course and headed to the central 
plaza. She glanced at me as I ran towards her.
Sure.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text: You're the first. So, it's decided.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Will you escort me? 
――Through the Twinkle Series.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
It took a few moments for her words to register. 
"I was offered a trainer contract"……once I 
understood what she was saying, there was only one answer.

And so, even though it was so sudden…… 
I had become Mejiro Ramonu's trainer.

――Huu…… Huu…… 
Huu……Fufuu.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Satisfied……is how I could describe that look, Ramonu. 
Watching your dazzling run, has made my heart clear.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Thank you, Rudolf. If that isn't a lie, 
will you show me your true heart?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
……I suppose my words were a bit exaggerated. While those 
words were true, there is certainly more to it than that.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
I heard, you've decided on a trainer? 
Congratulations. And……welcome.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
To me especially, this is something to be joyful 
about. With your entry, the racing world will 
continue to become even more sensational.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
……between our Symboli family and the Mejiro family. 
The time to fulfill our long held promise is nearing. 
I've already achieved it……next, it's your turn, Ramonu.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
……so you're a person without charm, it seems. 
It's very unappealing, unfortunately.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Even if it's not put in to words, I understand 
what my duty is. Of course I'll achieve it. 
However, something like that isn't……my only theme.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text: ――I just want to love. That's all……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
……right, that's just how you are. 
That your love might be fulfilled, I'll be praying for you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
……Fufuu…… Ahahaa…… yes, it's strange. 
Isn't that the point though, Loulou?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
Just wishing for it to be fulfilled wouldn't be love. 
I just want to love, devotedly……boundlessly.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

data.text:
I apologize for being so distant. I'll try to figure out 
all the subtleties, so would you please stop treating me 
like a child? ……I'm looking forward to watching your races.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
……No, I'll be the one to teach you. 
My love, will surpass your ideals……――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
